14,110 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = 08-16000 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0204797 }} Colorado Springs is a city in Colorado, United States. With 478,961 people in 2020, it is the second largest city in Colorado and the 39th most populous in the United States. It is also the county seat of El Paso County. It is the headquarters of Focus on the Family, which is a Christian group, and the United States Air Force Academy. Tourist attractions like Pikes Peak, Garden of the Gods the Cheyenne Mountain Zoo, Seven Falls, Manitou Springs, the Broadmoor Hotel and the Air Force Academy are also in the city and its surrounding area. ==References== ;Notes == Other websites == * City of Colorado Springs * Colorado Springs Convention & Visitor's Bureau * Colorado Springs Vacation Insider Category:County seats in Colorado Category:1886 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Colorado
